steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"ciuer","text":"Grow o/n a 5 mL culture of the strain to be transformed.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ffome","text":"      ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":2,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"3E93D550D88111EDBD3E33C72619D7D4","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"4CDD5D70D88111EDBD3E33C72619D7D4","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":0,"guid":"AAB23560D88111EDBD3E33C72619D7D4","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":["overnight"],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8jno6","text":"Dilute 1:100 of the preinoculum in 50 mL prewarmed LB (OD600 = 0,05).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":57,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cj5fg","text":"    ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":2,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"4194FCD0D88011EDBD3E33C72619D7D4","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"F4756060D88011EDBD3E33C72619D7D4","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c9afh","text":"Grow at 37ºC with agitation (170 rpm) until it reaches OD600 = 0,5.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":57,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"78bh8","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"shaker","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":0,"error_shaker":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"546E50D0D88111EDBD3E33C72619D7D4","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"shaker":false,"temperature":false},"shaker":"170","start":null,"temperature":"37","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4l15e","text":"Centrifuge the culture at 4000 g and 4ºC for 10 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2mg80","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"4000","duration":600,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"0CA74E80D88311EDBD3E33C72619D7D4","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"4","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"hpuc","text":"Recovery: add 250 µl of LB and incubate at 37ºC for 1 h.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d8egp","text":"    ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":2,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"301328E0D88711ED847081B5034EA9F4","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"355179B0D88711ED847081B5034EA9F4","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2c57k","text":"Plate 100 µl of the solution on LB agar plates supplemented with the indicated antibiotic and incubate o/n at 37ºC.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"46dt3","text":"    ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":2,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"4A826EC0D88711ED847081B5034EA9F4","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":0,"guid":"3F6F0B60D88711ED847081B5034EA9F4","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":["overnight"],"start":null}}}}
